desc: Kimberly Boutique is a luxury boutique for women to have access to the latest trends in the fashion industry. We are more than a Boutique, we are a clubhouse, where women can come in relax, shop, and socialize. We offer an array of unique designers to fit everyone's fashion needs.

layout.text: Kimberly Boutique was founded in 2005, with a driving force and purpose to outfit the fabulous women of Philadelphia. We are a luxury boutique for women to have access to the latest trends and staples in the fashion industry. We have become more than a boutique, we are a clubhouse, where women can come in relax, shop, and socialize. We offer an array of unique designers curated to fit into any woman’s closet without breaking their budget.
